attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hospital managers should only be paid for reducing wating timës as they do not have the power it seems to work out anything between consultants and the ward staff.Consultants are a power unto themselves and the managers should busy themselves in keeping operating theatres open after 16:00 hours.Instead of many managers can we not have one matrons back who do know the job from ground level

rejection.details: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to 'waiting lists' does not make sense. Please re-submit with a title that requests an action.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
